MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA9, PA12, KA15 & G78 postcode areas. We had no advance warning of this, and are working to get supplies restored. We are continuing to complete repairs to a broken electrical pole near to Rigfoot Farm and due to on site difficulties, we now expect your supply to be restored by 12:20am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:09 PM on Tuesday, 23 February 2021.
